sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR6200 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_AQTN_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_LSS_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #emymtSeilNum# , #idtlAccdtInsurClutYr# , #prmmIposDivCd# , #idtlAccdtInsurAqtnDt# , #idtlAccdtInsurLssDt# , #idtlAccdtPayTotAmnt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR6200 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR=#idtlAccdtInsurClutYr# , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD=#prmmIposDivCd# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_AQTN_DT=#idtlAccdtInsurAqtnDt# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_LSS_DT=#idtlAccdtInsurLssDt# , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#idtlAccdtPayTotAmnt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR=#idtlAccdtInsurClutYr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR6200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR=#idtlAccdtInsurClutYr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_AQTN_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_LSS_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR6200 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR=#idtlAccdtInsurClutYr#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR , PRMM_IPOS_DIV_CD , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_AQTN_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_LSS_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR6200 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM DESC , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_CLUT_YR DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR6200 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
